description.en: The course will stress all aspects of linguistic competence (listening, speaking, reading, writing). Main focus is on expanding vocabulary related with the students speciality and reading/understanding/explaining speciality-related academic texts.
description.et: Kursusel süvendatakse akadeemilise inglise keele osaoskusi (kuulamine, rääkimine, lugemine, kirjutamine). Erilist rõhku pannaks erialase sõnavara omandamisele ning erialaste tekstide lugemise/mõistmise/selgitamisoskuse arendamisele.

objectives.en: The aim of the course is expanding vocabulary, focusing on academical communication and expanding vocabulary related with the field of studies, developing and using it.
objectives.et: Kursuse eesmärgiks on üldise sõnavara laiendamine, rõhuga akadeemilise suhtluse ja erialase sõnavara omandamisel, arendamisel ja kasutamisel.

learning_outcomes.en: By the end of the course the student:
- knows the vocabulary related to her/his field of study;
- analyzes academic oral/written texts on the language and text level;
learning_outcomes.et: - oskab sõnavara ja teksti tasemel analüüsida akadeemilise suunitlusega suulist/kirjalikku teksti

learning_outcomes.en: - can work with the English texts related with her/his field of study;
- converse wbout what they have read and heard.
